title: Oracle Product Lifecycle Management ExportServlet Deserialization of Untrusted Data Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Oracle Product Lifecycle Management. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the ExportServlet. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in deserialization of untrusted data. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user.
addtionnal_details: Oracle has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpujan2024.html
timeline:
2023-10-06 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-02-06 - Coordinated public release of advisory
